reward.name: Reversal of Fortune
entries:
In response to another creature dealing damage to you, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage to 0 and regain {@dice 1d6} hit points. Once used, you can not regain hit points, including through magical healing, until the end of your next turn. 
				
				This ability may not be used again until finishing a long rest.

reward.name: Reversal of Fortune 3
entries:

				This ability may be used twice before finishing a long rest, upon which it recharges.
